thread.title: TAXI DRIVER CLAIMS MECAHNICAL FAULT TO BLAME FOR RAMMING CARS AT OLD AIRPORT ROAD

author: farhan
title: TAXI DRIVER CLAIMS MECAHNICAL FAULT TO BLAME FOR RAMMING CARS AT OLD AIRPORT ROAD
text:
TAXI DRIVER CLAIMS MECAHNICAL FAULT TO BLAME FOR RAMMING CARS AT OLD AIRPORT ROAD   
Dear A.S.S. Editor Advertisement 
Another crazy taxi driver. Take them all off the roads! The taxi driver who drove his taxi several times against cars at Old Airport Road now claimed that his taxi had mechanical failure, and he had no control over the taxi. 
So, blame the taxi, sure can get away with it! The taxi driver never heard of pulling out the ignition keys, if mechanical failure really was the problem ah? No key, no ignition, no engine running, no way the taxi can go back and forth violently. Lucky no one was actually standing near, or he could have been rammed by this crazy driver! 
Let the investigations be completed. Sure the findings will show the only fault is not mechanical, but driver. 
Simone Loy 
A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
